story: Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur added 33 new photos.
message:
Here are the results for the Hyderabad round of the Nationwide Prelims held on October 2nd at City Center Mall:
Congratulations to all the winners! 
SF Idol: Atulya, Prithvi, Viswaja, Abhilash Anand

Shake a Leg: Arpita, Abhishek

Two For a Tango: Ssquare (Susmita Rani, Sai Sirisha)

We thank Yvs Shriram and Pandit Siddharth Parashar for covering our Hyderabad leg of Hitch Hike!

story: Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur added 18 new photos — with Kshitij Yadav.
message:
Hey All! Here we present before you some glimpses of the Delhi Leg of our Nationwide Prelims, Hitch Hike that were conducted in DLF CyberHub and saw a huge gathering. The winners had to get past a very talented and huge pool of competitors. 

The results for the Delhi prelims as follows:
Two For A Tango: Bhangra Lions, Brown Boys Bhangra
Shuffle: Taandvika
Shake A Leg: Divya Goyal, Namita, Priyanshu
Nukkad: Deshbandu College, NSIT, Amity School of Biotechnology and Aurobindo College.
SF Idol: Tlana, Karan Kumar, Devang Pandey, Jibin Abraham and Shruti Panwar

Heartiest congratulations to the winners! The competition only gets tougher from here. :D

story: Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur added 28 new photos.
message:
This September, Spring Fest took a trip to Mumbai as part of our NationWide Prelims on the 30th at Infiniti Mall. The following teams/ participants qualify for the next round at Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur. We thank Media House Photography for these wonderful pics!

Shuffle: Refactor Dance Crew, UFDC, Famous in Dark Crew.
Shake a Leg: Prabhakar Garg; Rohit Keshari; Pradeep Gupta.
Nukkad: Team Dramebaaz; Rajiv Gandhi Institute.
SFIdol: Kaivalya Kejkar; Akash Sawle; Jeetika Hazariwala.

A hearty congratulations to all the winners!

Taking our Social Cause forward, we present to you the website for 'Umang- Stand Up to Stigma'. Scoot over to https://2018.social.springfest.in to learn more about Mental Illness and how it can affect us.

Feel free to lighten your heart! Drop an anonymous message to us on the portal sharing your experiences and suggestions.

#Umang #SF18 #Social

Website Credits- Sandeep Pattanayak
Content - Arghyanil Bhattacharjee

story: Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur updated their cover photo.

message:
Are you stressed about the mid semester exams that did not go well? Or about someone who ridiculed you for being fat? Are you really bogged down by the problems of your daily life? Even if you are not, there are people around you who actually are. 

In our humble bid to give voice to those who prefer to keep quiet, we launch our Social Cause for Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur 2018, 'Umang' on the occasion of World Mental Health Day.

You can join us in our cause for mental health and show support by adding our ‘Umang’ frame to your profile picture. You can send us your experiences and suggestions at https://2018.social.springfest.in .

Come let us not ignore this stigma anymore but stand up to it and join our hands in this campaign for creating a beautiful world with beautiful minds!

#StandUpToStigma #Umang #SpringFest2018

Design Credits: Richik Raha
Videography: Parag Mhaiske, Pranay Narayankar, Akshay Choudhary
Content: Ankurjyoti Baishya, Arghyanil Bhattacharjee

Yo Pune!

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur has hitch-hiked a long way to your city for the Pune leg of Nationwide Prelims.
Gear up for the prelims of Shake A Leg , Two For A Tango, SF Idol and Nukkad in association with Mad Over Music Academy and Swatantra Theatre on 8th of October.

Hoping to See you guys there!

#HitchHike
#SF2k18

story: Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur is with Himanshu Kushwaha.
message:
Spring Fest is coming to the "City of Lakes" for our Nationwide Prelims. The preliminary rounds for the events Nukkad, Shake a Leg, SFIdol and Two for a Tango will be conducted at Truba Institute @IncredibleTruba on 6th October in association with Mack Dance Cultural Institute and Rhythm The Musical Hunt.

Register at https://nwp.springfest.in

story: Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur is with Ranjan Nayak.
message:
Next in the list of Nationwide Prelims destinations, Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur is coming to Visakhapatnam. The events SFIdol, Shake A Leg, Two For A Tango and Shuffle being conducted in GITAM University on 8th of October, 2017 in association with Pace Creators Dance Academy Vizag and judged by none other than Ranjan Nayak.

Make sure to register at nwp.springfest.in

#HitchHike
#Sf2k18

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur is coming to your city next for our Nationwide Prelims for the events Shuffle, SFIdol, Shake a Leg and Two for a Tango on 2nd October at City Center Mall, 10:30 AM onward in association with Mln Academy of Music & Dance and Hyderabad DANCE Company.

Make sure to register at https://nwp.springfest.in/

Kasa Kai Mumbai!
Next in the list of Nationwide Prelims destinations, Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur hitch-hikes to the city of dreams - Mumbai. The events Nukkad, Shake A Leg, Two For A Tango and Shuffle being conducted in Infiniti Mall (Malad West) and The True School of Music hosting SF Idol on 30th of September, 2017 in association with Naujawaan-e-hind, K Squad dance crew, Beat Twisters Dance Studio & DANCE Masters CREW.

Make sure to register at nwp.springfest.in

#HitchHike

Hello Delhi!
Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur has hitch-hiked all the way up to the capital city for the Nationwide Prelims of Nukkad, SF Idol, Shake A Leg, Two For A Tango and Shuffle on 30th of September at DLF CyberHub in association with Songdew, CRAFT FILM School - Center for Research in Art of Film and Television. and scholarships worth INR 50,000 up for grabs by Tara Shastri Dance Music & Arts Academy - ASAR Rock School!
Make sure to register at nwp.springfest.in
#HitchHike
#Sf2k18

Hello Delhi!
Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur has hitch-hiked all the way up to the capital city for the Nationwide Prelims of Nukkad, SF Idol, Shake A Leg, Two For A Tango and Shuffle on 30th of September at DLF CyberHub in association with Songdew, CRAFT FILM School - Center for Research in Art of Film and Television. and scholarships worth INR 50,000 up for grabs by Tara Shastri Dance Music & Arts Academy - ASAR Rock School!
Make sure to register at nwp.springfest.in
#HitchHike
#Sf2k18

story: Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur added 5 new photos to the album: Engineer's Day.
message:
Engineering Students- A unique race of students who know how to procrastinate and still manage things on time. These people can survive on maggi for a semester, and won't go near the mess of a Mess.

All heroes don't wear capes. Some wear a single shirt throughout the semester.

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur wishes everyone a Happy Engineer's Day.

Design Credits- Dinesh Sahni

#EngineersDay
#SF2018

MidSems aren't 'a week away' anymore, they commence tomorrow!
So stop scrolling through your Facebook feed, it's never too late to start mugging. 
Or maybe watch a few more episodes of your favorite TV series?
And let's not forget to print our Admit Cards.

PS: 'Don't try this at home.'

#MidSem #HappyMugging

Design- Amlan Kumar Sahu

story: Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur added 5 new photos to the album: हिंदी दिवस.
message:
H̶a̶p̶p̶y̶ ̶H̶i̶n̶d̶i̶ ̶D̶i̶w̶a̶s̶

हिंदी दिवस की शुभकामनाएं

#हिंदी_दिवस #वसंत_उत्सव_2018

"Opportunities are like sunrises. If you wait too long, you miss them." 

Here we present before you the registration portal for Hitch Hike, the Nationwide Prelims of Spring Fest 2018 which will be happening in all the major cities of India this October! 

Scoot over to https://nwp.springfest.in/ to register your team and book your slots! 

Grab this opportunity and 'Hitch Hike' your way to the Finals at Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur.

Kudos to Akash, Ankita, Atul, Neelanjan, Nilay, Nishant, Omar, Prakhar, Sandeep and Shashi for getting together our NWP Portal!

#HitchHike
#SpringFest_2018

Let's take some time to honour those who made us who we are.
Let's take a day to recognize the "Heroes without Capes" and appreciate their contribution to the society.

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur wishes everyone a very Happy Teachers' Day.

#HappyTeachersDay #HeroesWithoutCapes 
#SF2k18 #TribalTreble

story: Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur is with Yamini Bhangale and 27 others.
message:
Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur invites applications for the position of Campus Ambassador for the 59th edition of the fest. Interested to be a part of one of the biggest college festivals in the country? This is your chance! 

Spread the word about Spring Fest in your college to earn an official certificate and set yourself apart from the crowd. Loads of goodies up for grabs!!

To register yourself as a Campus Ambassador, visit https://ca.springfest.in now

#CampusAmbassador #SF2k18

Meet these young ladies taking a stand to Make The World Wonderful and implementing their vision of harmony in the world by their innovative teaching methods. 
Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur appreciates and supports the workings of this beautiful organization. Be there to support the cause and find out about their inspiring journey.

To support their cause log on to http://maketheworldwonderful.org

Venue: Kalidas Auditorium
Time: 6:30 PM
Date: 29th August 2017

Be there at V4, Vikramshila on 24th August in your respective slots after registering at springfest.in/selections.

With this, we introduce our final Best Campus Ambassador for Spring Fest 2017. Meet Kiran Balmiki from Xavier Institute of Social Service, Ranchi and Best CA for Eastern India.
"Thank you so much for selecting me as the best campus ambassador of the East zone. 
Working as a campus ambassador was an amazing journey for me, I enjoyed it throughout with lots of learning. 
Working in a network like this was a very different experience. It gave me confidence for initiating things and recognition for my work."- said Kiran when told about this achievement.

What if the elders find out? 😮

Meet our best Campus Ambassador from Southern India, Vivek Ranjan from GITAM University, Visakhapatnam.
"Spring Fest 2017 was like a remarkable memory in my life. I enjoyed all the funny and entertaining competitions held at IIT Kharagpur. 
I got to watch loads of talents and learned a lot from the greats who performed at IIT Kharagpur. The different kinds of competitions being organized there proved that there's no stop to creativity and innovation. 
Finally, I would like to conclude that it was a very informative and an awesome experience at IIT Kharagpur. 
Also, I am looking forward to continue visiting Spring Fest every year with my team. Thank you! 🙂"- said Vivek about his experience at Spring Fest.

Meet our best Campus Ambassador from Southern India, Vivek Ranjan from GITAM University, Visakhapatnam.
"Spring Fest 2017 was like a remarkable memory in my life. I enjoyed all the funny and entertaining competitions held at IIT Kharagpur. 
I got to watch loads of talents and learned a lot from the greats who performed at IIT Kharagpur. The different kinds of competitions being organized there proved that there's no stop to creativity and innovation. 
Finally, I would like to conclude that it was a very informative and an awesome experience at IIT Kharagpur. 
Also, I am looking forward to continue visiting Spring Fest every year with my team. Thank you! 🙂"- said Vivek about his experience at Spring Fest.

Next in line, we introduce Riya Rastogi from Dyal Singh College, New Delhi and Best Campus Ambassador for Northern India.

Here's what she says about her experience- 
"I have been a part of SF for the last two years and it has always been a memorable journey for me and my team. 
Chosen as a CA built a responsibility for keeping the team together. Full day hard work in competitions, fun in the star-nights and long night walks were the best moments for us. 
The hospitality provided by SF team and freedom allowed by IIT KGP administration just adds up to the fun.The time we spent there has always been  the best memories that remind us of the bond we have as a team."

Next in line, we introduce Riya Rastogi from Dyal Singh College, New Delhi and Best Campus Ambassador for Northern India.

Here's what she says about her experience- 
"I have been a part of SF for the last two years and it has always been a memorable journey for me and my team. 
Chosen as a CA built a responsibility for keeping the team together. Full day hard work in competitions, fun in the star-nights and long night walks were the best moments for us. 
The hospitality provided by SF team and freedom allowed by IIT KGP administration just adds up to the fun.The time we spent there has always been  the best memories that remind us of the bond we have as a team."

message:
Always feels great to have new people in the Family. 

Hold on tight guys, you're in for a bumpy ride but a great adventure!

#SFFamily
#SF2k18 #Core #Design #Web

story: Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur added 2 new photos — with Sachin Uttarwar and 22 others.
message:
Always feels great to have new people in the Family. 

Hold on tight guys, you're in for a bumpy ride but a great adventure!

#SFFamily
#SF2k18 #Core #Design #Web

Introducing the Best Campus Ambassadors of Spring Fest 2017. 
Here's what Harshal Garg, Best CA for Central India had to say about his experience- 
"Spring Fest is absolutely justified as one of the best cultural fests of India and this year was no exception. I, along with 60 of my friends, had a great time and a wonderful journey.

Everything from management and competitions to the concerts was worthy of appreciation. All the coordinators were helpful and professional. 

The campus itself is beautiful and the cleanliness is something to behold. Looking forward to visit again."
